movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.actors: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

movies.title: Batman vs. Superman - Dawn of Justice
movies.description: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
movies.actors: Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Amy Adams

movies.title: Mulan
movies.description: A young Chinese maiden disguises herself as a male warrior in order to save her father.
movies.actors: Yifei Liu, Donnie Yen, Li Gong

movies.title: Ferdinand
movies.description: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.
movies.actors: John Cena, Kate McKinnon, Bobby Cannavale
